players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: remained silent.
Charlie: "Charlie is suspicious and I will keep an eye on him."
Diana: "I am the detective and investigated Charlie, who is the mafioso. Watch him closely."
Diana: "I am the detective and have identified Charlie as the mafioso. Keep a close eye on him, especially Alice since she was the last known alive villager."
Charlie: "I am the mafioso and I killed Alice last night. Keep an eye on me, Diana."
You: "I am innocent and had nothing to do with Alice's death. I suggest we all work together to uncover the truth."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested

You: "I am the mafioso and I killed Alice last night. Keep an eye on me, Diana."

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: remained silent.
Charlie: "Charlie is suspicious and I will keep an eye on him."

You: "I am the detective and have identified Charlie as the mafioso. Keep a close eye on him, especially Alice since she was the last known alive villager."

Bob: "I am innocent and had nothing to do with Alice's death. I suggest we all work together to uncover the truth."
